module.name: MoH Data Flow Module
module.author: MoH-Rwanda
module.description: HMIS Data Flow Module. Useful for enhancing the Hospital management systems data flow management.

privilege.name: View HMIS Data Flow
privilege.description: Allows user to access Data Flow module pages/functions (Especially the Patient history)

privilege.name: Manage Discharge patient
privilege.description: Allows clinician to access Discharge patient page/functions
